Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://wave-api.appspot.com/public/wave.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://wave-uml-editor.kenai.com/wave-as-client.js"></script>
<object id="waveumleditor" name="waveumleditor" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" data="http://wave-uml-editor.kenai.com/wave-uml-editor/main.swf" width="100%" height="500px"> <param name="movie" value="http://wave-uml-editor.kenai.com/wave-uml-editor/main.swf" /> <param name="quality" value="high" /> <param name="wmode" value="transparent" /> <param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always" /> <param name="allowNetworking" value="all" /> </object>
